Injustice:"  "That's Injustice, and what exactly do you suggest?"
Darkfate: "Don't annoy the parrot... By now"said the male"We may get 
the name using others ways but if you touch a feather of the parrot, 
his sweet girlfriend  won't help us"
Ijustice:  The clone recieved his energon and took a long drink.  He 
set the cup down and thought for a moment.  "But I must know!  It's 
like he is keeping family away from me.  I might be a clone of 
Malice, but I at least deserve to know who this brother is."
Darkfate: "well a reason more to don't mis-treat your "sister's" 
boyfriend"said the male"Perhaps we can get the name suing other 
tactics... Agree?"
Injustice:  The clone growled, then sighed.  Darkfate was right.  
About a few things.  "Alright.  I won't bother him.  So what other 
methods of extracting information do you propose?"
Darkfate: "Hiden Microphones... and stuff like that..."said the 
male"We may let, the love birds chat each other and sooner or later 
they would mention that and more"
Injustice:  "So its a waiting game."  He takes another dink, and 
slams the glass on the table.  "I hate waiting!  But what choice do 
we have?"
Darkfate: "Anyone"said camly the male"Perhaps, we should go to 
prepare all, and aks permition to Unicron, he has to  know all the 
plan"
Injustice:  "You go ask him, I'm tired.  I need o go rest fopr a 
while."
Darkfate: "Right"said the male"give me the codes in order work 
inside parrot's room, he would be sleeping for a large whil"
Injustice:  "Sure, here they come," he says as he transmits the 
codes to Darkfate and stands up.  He finishes his glass then sets it 
on the table and walks off to the med lab, to take a nap on one of 
the beds there.
Darkfate: Darkfate went to Unicron's chamber where he exposed the 
plan and he aproved. Then Darkfate went to room where Winlord was 
sleeping and intalled and hid the microphones. After that, Darkfate 
cheked the male and calculed that soon the sedative would pass. He 
left the chamber and looked down.
Organics:  She takes a break from her search and sits down on the 
bed, exhausted.  "Man, this is harder than I thought."
Darkfate: Darkfate hit the door of Organic's room.
Organics:  She looks up to the door for a moment, then sighed, 
figuring it was Injustice or someone to give her a hard 
time.  "What?"
Darkfate: "It's Darkfate"said
Organics:  "What do you want?  Leave me alone."
Darkfate: "Unicron sent me to check your progress"replied the male
Organics:  "I need to take a break, there is too many similar energy 
signatures, I have to hav time to look at them all."
Darkfate: "Unicron seems to tought the same"growled the male"He 
commanded me that lead you to your boyfriend's quarters... It' seems 
that he likes that you can check that he have done his part"
Organics:  "Fine.  Lets go, I want to check on him, make sure you 
didn't do anything to him."
Darkfate: "Well Follow me"said athe male and walked towards 
Windlord's room 
Organics:  The femme wearily followed the Minion, watching him 
carefully.
Darkfate/Windlord: The male arrived to Windlor's quarters and opened 
the door "He will be weak due, Unicron's orders"said the male"We 
know that you have same powers as Malice and you can give him some 
of your energy... but if you do it you will regret it.... I'll bring 
some food for him... enjoy!"
Windlord was awakening and he felt weak and stunned
Organics:  She rushes past Darkfate and held Windlord close in her 
arms, craddling him gntly.  "How are you, how do you feel?"
Windlord: "Weak..."said softly the male"I feel as my body were heavy 
as space ship..."
Organics:  "You'll be taken care of, but you'll have to be like 
this, they want you weak and helpless, so thy cand force me to work 
for thm.  WHat have they done to you?"
Windlord: "nothing serious yet..."whiule pain mirroed his face"but 
your family is in danger...."
Darkfate: walled towards corritor and opened com link with 
Injustice "Injustice wake up!"
Organics:  "What do you mean?  Malice is aleady missing, what else 
can go wrong?"
Injustice:  The clone sluggishly wakes up and opens the comm 
channel.  "WHat?  Can't it wait, I was asleep!"
Darkfate: "All it's getting recording in a special chamber, I'll 
sent you the location... I have to prepare, parrot's meal"
Injustice:  "Well, wake me up when they are done talking, I was in 
the middle of a good dream"  The clone cloes the channel and goes 
back to sleep.
 Darkfate: "Ok"
Windlord: The male's eyes showed sorrow, and said "It was my fault , 
my dear, I thoge slipped and mentioned that you had other bro... 
Injustice... presed me to continue, altought I didn't say his name, 
he knows that in Maximal Base is your other Bro"
Organics:  "But they can't go get him.  And that is what is driving 
the clone up the wall.  He wants Big Bro, but can he handle him... 
Only Malice and Optimus Prime could stop him, but couldn't even kill 
him.  Injustice won't even be able to touch him."
Windlord:  "But  they can force him to serve Unicron... if they have 
you "replied weakly the male
Organics:  "No, Big Bro is so much stronger than Malice or me.  He 
won't bend to their wills.  He would come up here and tear a big 
hole in Unicron just to let all the hot air out of him, He won't be 
tmpted even for a second."
Windlord: "I hope so... my dear..."said the male"I'm worried about 
your safely... if they are decided, they would do every thing to do 
their goals"
Organics:  "And they would have the Emperor of Destruction brathing 
down their tailpipes.  Yhey really don't know who they're dealling 
with."
Windlord: Windlord sighed and weakly hold Organic's hand
Organics:  "Don't worry, we'll ge out of this soon, and send Unicron 
back to where he came from."
Windlord: "Just take care... I have a bad feeling"said the male"I 
only regret don't have enought streng to take you a way of this 
place"
Organics:  he fmme smiled and hugged Windlord for a moment.  "Don't 
worry about it, Megatron likes you a litle too much to let you get 
killed.  You did promis to make me happy, remember?"
Windlord: "Yes"said soflty the male
bustercross365: Organics:  The fmme smiles more and keeps holding 
Windlord.  She however begins to drift to sleep.
Windlord: Windlord smiled and weakly he huged her, he also was 
falling sleep
